channel.title: How to get my client to load 6000.dats+?
channel.description: Can any of you help me with my problem? if i put any dats that have 60000+ in my raw file the client gets an error Example: if i put a dat named 63457 in my raw file and run the client it gets an error. here is an screen shot of my problem. [img]http://i53.tinypic.com/103an9h.jpg[/img]

item.title: How to get my client to load 6000.dats+?
item.dc:creator: @Brandontan Brandontan
item.description:
@Brandontan wrote:

you have too many arrays, go and add 18 more to each segment to where it says
at (so and so file) <file.java: 163>

Read full topic
item.source: How to get my client to load 6000.dats+?
